description:
中文／English／日本語

贊助、合作、媒體、委託，請洽《台灣二三事》製作委員會。
聯絡信箱：hi@taiwan23.com
facebook：https://www.facebook.com/taiwan23
　
【什麼是《台灣二三事》？／What is 'Taiwan Trivia'?】
《台灣二三事》，讓世界看見台灣獨有的大小事。
　
福爾摩沙專屬的24小時商店、各地腔調、選舉狂熱、多元物種，
更別提國際垂涎的寶島美食等，都是台灣特有、令人無法抗拒的魅力與可愛。
　
《台灣二三事》團隊精選23件台灣讓世界著迷的大小事，做成每集3分鐘的動畫，
由風靡台灣社群的插畫天團熱情跨界演出，中文發音搭配英文字幕，
隨手分享給外國朋友，或自己說給外國朋友聽！
自己的國民外交自己救（噓，素材我們幫大家準備好啦～）
　
'Taiwan Trivia' will tell you everything that distinguishes Taiwan from the rest of the world.

On this island referred to by the Portuguese as "Formosa", meaning "beautiful island" we have a convenient and bustling lifestyle involving: 24/7 shops, a passion for politics, diverse fauna species, various local tones and not to mention mouth-watering foods around every bend. These all add up to the distinct beauty and irresistible charm of Taiwan.

The 'Taiwan Trivia' team has selected 23 things, great and small, that are unique to Taiwan. Each topic will be composed into a animation. It is a collaborative project involving one of Taiwan's leading online illustrators with a great social media presence. Narrated in Mandarin with English subtitles, let us shed some light on Taiwan for you!　

台湾はポルトガル人にフォルモサ（美しき島）と呼ばれ、昔から自然の美しさを世界に誇­ります。現在、この島に住む人々も便利で多彩な生活をしており、世界中の人々に羨まれ­ています。「台灣二三事」製作委員会は台湾の人気イラストレーターとコラボし、台湾の­豆知識について、定期的に動画を作成します。数え切れないB級グルメ、世界でも稀有な­野生生物、台湾各地の方言、、、など多様なテーマで、「台灣二三事」と一緒に台湾の面­白さと暖かさを発見しましょう。

【《台灣二三事》第0集：選舉】
台灣，有獨步全球的選舉文化，一到選舉，全台就進入殺紅眼的戰爭狀態。
不管平時感情再好，選戰期間，就是要拼個你死我活！
今天，《台灣二三事》就與你一起了解台灣選舉的各種戰術！
　
【《台灣二三事》第0集　延伸閱讀】　
想了解更多關於台灣選舉嗎？
菜市場政治學：http://goo.gl/Lo4RCt
王業立《比較選舉制度》


【《台灣二三事》第0集　團隊名單】
　
原作：連勝丼
編劇：骨梗工作室
動畫製作：Re-lab
音樂製作：亞爾薩音樂
整合行銷：貝殼放大股份有限公司
　
聲音演出：星期天配音是對的
　
作畫：連勝丼
腳本監製：陳思傑
腳本討論：王成祥、林大涵、陳思傑、黃威愷、鄭昱宏、蕭安、老天
動畫監製：王成祥
動畫協力：葉仁智
音樂監製：張詠承
音效監製：洪立
　
英文翻譯：羅文劭、洪鼎雅
日文翻譯：陳育律、武井槙人
　
製作：《台灣二三事第零集》製作委員會
召集人：林大涵
統籌：黃威愷
製片：蕭安
　
特別感謝：
楊勝智、陳孜昊、吳培弘、陳亦琳、陳胤竹、李元禎、劉家熙
　
媒體夥伴：
香港高登綜合台
台灣冷門景點熱血復甦計畫 - 歐北來
我在旅行 I Am Traveling
How Fun 如何爽
　
北美大使：林子峻
日本宣傳：陳育律
批踢踢宣傳：老天
　
--
　
正片將於2015年2月上映，請各位「訂閱」我們並持續追蹤 :D

title: 奧步？台灣的選舉文化 -《台灣二三事》第0集 'Taiwan Trivia' Ep0: Election

subtitles.en:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:03,100
Welcome to another episode of “Taiwan Trivia”!

2
00:00:03,140 --> 00:00:06,860
Taiwan has a political culture that is umatched by the rest of this world.

3
00:00:06,900 --> 00:00:07,940
During election time,

4
00:00:07,980 --> 00:00:11,560
the whole nation enters a war zone.

5
00:00:11,560 --> 00:00:13,560
No matter how chummy you are with Tom, Dick and Harry,

6
00:00:13,560 --> 00:00:17,580
during the campaigning period, it’s pretty much a fight to everyone’s death.

7
00:00:17,620 --> 00:00:21,360
Today, in “Taiwan Trivia”,

8
00:00:21,400 --> 00:00:24,280
we’ll be looking at the various tactics employed during election time.

9
00:00:24,280 --> 00:00:25,360
Tactic #1:

10
00:00:25,400 --> 00:00:27,600
Establishing GREAT first impressions require GREAT measures! 

11
00:00:27,640 --> 00:00:30,540
Establishing GREAT first impressions require GREAT measures! 

12
00:00:30,580 --> 00:00:32,280
“Will they fill us in about their policies?” 

13
00:00:32,280 --> 00:00:35,020
Never mind about the policies. Let’s start with a GIANT head shot!

14
00:00:35,060 --> 00:00:36,880
Now just add a visionary backdrop,

15
00:00:36,920 --> 00:00:39,260
a dash of credibility

16
00:00:39,300 --> 00:00:42,060
and a splash of international insight.

17
00:00:42,100 --> 00:00:43,120
Then for the most important part,

18
00:00:43,160 --> 00:00:44,940
the ability to make a difference...to TRANSFORM.

19
00:00:44,980 --> 00:00:46,360
(Who the hell is this?!)

20
00:00:46,400 --> 00:00:47,540
Tactic #2:

21
00:00:47,580 --> 00:00:49,460
is more “beefed up”;

22
00:00:49,500 --> 00:00:51,360
literally beefing up our citizens’ health!

23
00:00:51,380 --> 00:00:54,680
“My vision for a better future is to provide free beef in all cafeterias!”

24
00:00:54,720 --> 00:00:56,320
And in order to crush other competitors,

25
00:00:56,360 --> 00:00:58,360
we’re going to dish out larger and larger bits of beef (and bullshit).

26
00:00:58,400 --> 00:01:02,500
Mockery: “My election promise is to provde all old people with nyotaimori (sushi served on naked girls)!”

27
00:01:02,540 --> 00:01:05,020
We’re going above and beyond beefing things up!

28
00:01:05,060 --> 00:01:07,860
“We’re going to provide all ‘naked girl sushi platters’ with FREE...CHILDREN!”

29
00:01:07,900 --> 00:01:09,040
 (Um, I think you need to reword your script.)

30
00:01:09,080 --> 00:01:09,960
Tactic #3:

31
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:11,980
When you need a public image boost,

32
00:01:12,020 --> 00:01:14,040
get your wives involved!

33
00:01:14,060 --> 00:01:15,600
A hot missus.

34
00:01:15,620 --> 00:01:17,380
(Oh my goodness, she’s the bomb!)

35
00:01:17,420 --> 00:01:19,880
A hot missus who’s also a doctor.

36
00:01:19,920 --> 00:01:22,200
(Ooh, beauty AND brains!)

37
00:01:22,240 --> 00:01:25,500
Or a hot missus in a wheelchair who also happens to be a pedetrician

38
00:01:25,540 --> 00:01:27,620
(Ooh, beauty and brains!)

39
00:01:27,660 --> 00:01:28,600
(...AND let’s feel sorry for her!)

40
00:01:28,600 --> 00:01:30,420
(This is all too full of bull!)

41
00:01:30,460 --> 00:01:31,640
Tactic #4: 

42
00:01:31,660 --> 00:01:35,020
In the event of a campaigning emergency, get aquainted with big shots.

43
00:01:35,060 --> 00:01:36,960
If you support George, then you also support Mark.

44
00:01:36,960 --> 00:01:38,960
If you support Mark, then you don’t support Wendy. 

45
00:01:38,960 --> 00:01:40,800
If you don’t support Wendy then you support Kerry.

46
00:01:40,800 --> 00:01:43,300
If you don’t support Kerry then you also don’t support Peter. 

47
00:01:43,340 --> 00:01:44,960
So…

48
00:01:44,960 --> 00:01:46,220
If you support Mary,

49
00:01:46,260 --> 00:01:47,840
how many legs are in the image above? 

50
00:01:47,880 --> 00:01:49,460
(This is no time for algebra!)

51
00:01:49,500 --> 00:01:50,480
Tactic #5:

52
00:01:50,520 --> 00:01:53,280
When you’ve been caught out, disassociate yourself.

53
00:01:53,300 --> 00:01:55,540
“I had nothing to do with this, the protestors acted out on their own accord.”

54
00:01:55,580 --> 00:01:58,120
“This statement was issued by the governor secretary, I had nothing to do with it.”

55
00:01:58,140 --> 00:01:59,960
And even when you do get snapped up in a cosy pose,

56
00:02:00,000 --> 00:02:02,160
“He’s embroiled in an extra-marital affair!”

57
00:02:02,200 --> 00:02:03,380
You can simply disassociate from this other “member” of parliament.

58
00:02:03,420 --> 00:02:05,720
You can simply disassociate from this other “member” of parliament.

59
00:02:05,760 --> 00:02:07,200
(So he’s now disassociated AND dismembered?!)

60
00:02:07,240 --> 00:02:08,100
Tactic #6:

61
00:02:08,140 --> 00:02:11,240
And finally, just before the actual election,

62
00:02:11,280 --> 00:02:13,080
hold a rallying banquet where you use all the above tactics in one night!

63
00:02:13,120 --> 00:02:15,340
hold a rallying banquet where you use all the above tactics in one night!

64
00:02:15,380 --> 00:02:20,340
So let’s get our giant notice boards ready,

65
00:02:20,380 --> 00:02:24,020
put the beef on the grill and let all our wives do the entertaining!

66
00:02:24,060 --> 00:02:29,140
“If we lose, the world is going to end! AM I RIGHT?”

67
00:02:29,180 --> 00:02:31,660
“YES!”

68
00:02:31,700 --> 00:02:36,980
“If the opposition wins, we’ll all migrate to Mars, ARE YOU ALL COMING?”

69
00:02:37,020 --> 00:02:40,440
“YES!”

70
00:02:47,780 --> 00:02:49,780
So as the battle of the campaigns end,

71
00:02:49,780 --> 00:02:53,040
people resume their normal lives.

72
00:02:53,040 --> 00:02:54,480
The giant bill boards are torn down,

73
00:02:54,500 --> 00:02:57,100
the beefed up promises whether literal or not never get fulfilled,

74
00:02:57,100 --> 00:02:59,520
the missus carries on with her afternoon tea parties,

75
00:02:59,560 --> 00:03:02,760
and very few people seem to care about the truth.

76
00:03:02,760 --> 00:03:05,200
The winners continue their victorious cheers,

77
00:03:05,200 --> 00:03:08,680
and the losers? Well they’ve lost. 

78
00:03:08,680 --> 00:03:14,080
We get so caught up in distinguishing between winning and loosing.

79
00:03:14,120 --> 00:03:15,820
But, democracy, 

80
00:03:15,860 --> 00:03:18,140
should not be a battle between the opposition parties.

81
00:03:18,140 --> 00:03:23,320
We are suddenly so crazily passionate leading up to the election period. 

82
00:03:23,340 --> 00:03:26,660
Yet, we spend the next four years forgetting to continue demanding for our rights.

83
00:03:26,700 --> 00:03:27,900
Yet, we spend the next four years forgetting to continue demanding for our rights.

84
00:03:27,940 --> 00:03:29,400
Yet, we spend the next four years forgetting to continue demanding for our rights.

85
00:03:29,420 --> 00:03:32,060
Yet, we spend the next four years forgetting to continue demanding for our rights.

86
00:03:32,100 --> 00:03:33,180
Democracy,

87
00:03:33,220 --> 00:03:35,620
should not end on the day of the election.

88
00:03:35,660 --> 00:03:40,640
Instead, even after the polls are out, we need to continue to scrutinise our voted representitives.

89
00:03:40,680 --> 00:03:45,500
Taiwan and our national politics requires everyone’s care and support.

90
00:03:45,500 --> 00:03:48,800
Democracy, is not about defeating the opposition’s fort.

91
00:03:48,800 --> 00:03:51,340
Instead it is about planting a seed in everyone’s heart.

92
00:03:51,340 --> 00:03:53,340
(Timing!)

93
00:03:53,340 --> 00:03:56,400
All characters depicted in this story are purely fictional.

94
00:03:56,400 --> 00:03:57,820
Any coincedental similarities are simply, 

95
00:03:57,820 --> 00:03:59,360
coincedental similarities.

96
00:03:59,360 --> 00:04:01,080
Thank you for watching ‘Taiwan Trivia’,

97
00:04:01,080 --> 00:04:03,320
until next time! 

98
00:04:03,320 --> 00:04:05,320
XOXO!

fulltitle: 奧步？台灣的選舉文化 -《台灣二三事》第0集 'Taiwan Trivia' Ep0: Election
